DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate impact telemedicine system rural hospital diagnosis treatment Diabetes retinopathy Diabetes macular edema .
DOC.brief_title: Uptake Telemedicine System Trial Rual Canton
DOC.detailed_description: Telemedicine system mainly contain comprehensive eye examination electric-records ( E-record ) , transfer fundus picture rural hospital professional Graders ( golden standard diagnose Diabetes Retinopathy ( DR ) Diabetes Macular Edema ( DME ) ) . In Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center ( ZOC ) . By system , investigator evaluate capacity rural eye doctor diagnosis DR/DME , give proper suggestion treatment revisit plan .
DOC.criteria: age > 40y , diagnose ( Diabetes Retinopathy ) DR,10 % normal patient unconsciousness , history diabetic ketoacidosis , cardiac insufficiency , Severe atrioventricular block , hepatic insufficiency , allergic mydriatic
